sense.def:
Shade
je območje, kjer je temno in hladno, ker sonce ne seže do tja.

seg.quote: There are no trees or bushes to give shade.
The air is cool in the shade.
...the shade of a large oak tree.

sense.def:
Kadar kraj
is shaded by something
, zaradi nečesa svetloba ne more priti tja.

seg.quote: The broad walks are shaded by chestnut trees.

sense.def:
A shade
pomeni isto kot
a lampshade
.

seg.quote: ...a lamp with a thick silk shade.

sense.def:
The shades of a particular colour
so različice iste barve. Na primer, smaragdno zelena in olivno zelena sta različici zelene barve.

seg.quote: ...jackets in shades of pink, blue, and brown.

sense.def:
The shades of something abstract
so različice nečesa abstraktnega, zlasti kadar so razlike med njimi malenkostne.

seg.quote: The phrase has many shades of meaning.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
shades into another thing
, med tema dvema stvarema ni jasne meje.
